DOC.criteria: Must currently diagnose either Type I Type II diabetes mellitus . Must currently perform self monitor blood glucose Must 1870 year age ( inclusive ) . Must able read follow study instruction English . Pregnant ( self report ) History poor blood circulation . Any skin condition finger prevents blood sampling . History bleed disorder . Neuropathy condition affect sensation hand .
